Room.Name: Khelleva Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Khelleva Drive, running past the Khelleva Mansion.
Room.LongDescription: The Khelleva Family, the virtual financial founders of the city of Oceancrest, claimed this land for themselves many decades ago before the city was even planned out. This road runs straight past their Mansion and the Khelleva Stables. It runs northwest, eventually hitting the Khelleva Circle. To the southeast is the intersection of Lankshire Parkway and Overland Drive.
